title: Requesting new ultimate that can bounce off walls.
body:
alright.. ability travels only a set distance (think about the range of xerath's ult)
the ability can bounce off walls
the ability can go thru champions and minions and neutral monsters.

why i think something like this is viable and unique:
we have champions with wall interactions whether they hook to it ({{champion:111}} ) or collide into it ({{champion:14}} ) but we dont really have a interaction of bouncing off walls.
when i thought of this i was trying to steal dragon.. and it didnt go as planned then i had a thought.. what if i had an ability i could shoot in there and it bounce off all the walls shredding whatever is inside of the dragon pit.
although it is an ability with limited range .. i feel this can have an effect of people working with angles and bounce the ability off walls and around corners.  

i dont have any art program on this computer but if i could draw lines within the dragon pit i would to give a visual idea of angles to help people who cant see an idea in their head.

yeah.. added interaction would be {{champion:48}} pillar and {{champion:34}}  wall.. but that can either be an additional skill to pull off or could block this ability.. so much potential for champion interactions.

If you are an ADC and you want more options.. please up vote and get this idea visible to Riot and their team.

Getting people to go through walls isn't hard.

Getting things to bounce off of them is. Especially when a single mistake in the collision mapping could be exploited by or ruin the mechanic.

This is a pretty terrible idea, and I'll tell you why. It's INCREDIBLY easy to abuse. There is absolutely no way people aren't going to abuse this if it became a thing.

It's not hard to imagine people taking 2-3 Ranged champions simply to have this. APC Ezreal, maybe ADC Caitlyn. Possibly topped off by Support Lulu, and Top Lane Gnar. This is immediately problem from its concept stages, because you know everyone is willing to abuse something like this. 

The only way I would ever see this being an okay thing, would be if not only did it reduce its damage by dropping to 50 then 25, 0, but if there was a trade off to this. Like building an item with pretty much no stats, just a small shitty support like item that gives you a bare minimal of everything. That way there's at least that trade between a Damage item for a Utility item. Otherwise can you not just imagine Ezreal blazing his Q in there, about once every 2 seconds because he can? Each one dealing an approximate 400 damage on initial impact, a total of 700 Possible? 

Honestly this would need to have a lot of limitations. Like certain skill shots only bounce until they hit someone. Or others can only bounce twice before the vanish. Not to mention this poses a challenge to skill shots that go through champs, Only a limited number of champions have skill shots that actually only hit 1 target.

 It's a nice idea, but it has a tremendous amount of issues.

I can just see the Camps already. Not only that, it creates an extreme amount of complexity in coding. You'd have so much to do, it's way easier to just add some new items or buff some champs, than rework an entire mechanic that can collapse the game.

It's a big To Do List:

1. Figure out which skill shots will interact with this mechanic.
 How will Single Target Skill Shots interact with this?
 How will Multi-target Skill Shots interact with this?

2. What will be the downsides to having this, if any?
 What kind of Down Scale will this have, if any?

3. What surfaces will have this interaction? 
- What if you don't want to have this interaction?
- How will this function with Skill shots you want to go through walls?

4. How will this effect Jungle Camps?
 Reduced Damage?

5. Program all this into the game.
 Sort out EVERY skill shot in the game after careful planning. Then go into the code and begin programming (Easily the most time consuming part.)

It's really unrealistic to apply this mechanic. Way too many things to figure out, and as the Meta changes it may become either extremely powerful, or not as amazing.
